message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $10,000. I believe it provides significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, $8,000 is below my minimum. Could you do $9,000? This would still be a great deal for you.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,500?
